summary: This CBBE-based body is custom created in Bodyslide and HDT compatible.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]
Description[/size][size=4]:[/size][/b][size=4]
[/size]
This is my HDT body preset which I personally use for all of my playthroughs. I created this body in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url] and now I want to share it with you guys.
My intention was to create a natural and well proportioned looking body with a noticeable range between weight 0 and 100 but without to tend to skinny or to chubby. I dislike enormous breasts, nipples, butts or other kind of shapelessness, that's why some may will not find here what they are looking for.
I know aesthetic is a subjective perception but for my personal taste, I managed to create that kind of natural looking body I prefer. By the way the body looks best with [size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body[/url][/size].

English isn't my first language but I tried to write proper and understandable but if you still find spelling mistakes, feel free to contact me for a better description.

If you like the mod, I would be glad if you endorse it. If you want you can also upload a few pics, it would be much apreciated. :)


[b][size=4]Requirement:[/size][/b]

[list]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url][/size]
[*][size=2]and their requirements![/size]
[/list]
[b]Optional[/b]:

[list]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url][/size]
[/list]
[size=4][b]
Recommended mods:[/b][size=2]
[/size][/size]
[list]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49285/?]Feminine Hands CBBE[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37022/?]FemFeet Redesigned[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59416/?]HDT Bounce and Jiggles[/url][/size]
[/list]
[b][size=2]Optional:[/size][/b]

[list]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16731/?]Fitness Body Blender[/url][/size][/size]
[size=2]

[/size][/list][size=4][b]Installation:[/b]
[/size]
[u]Manual[/u] - Simply download the file and extract everything into your Data folder.

[u]Nexus Mod Manager[/u] - Download the file to NMM and install it like you would any other mod.

[u]Mod Organizer[/u] - Download the file to MO and install it like you would any other mod.
Or download the archive manually and open the zip via MO and install.


[size=4][b]Uninstalling:[/b][/size]

[u]Manual[/u] - Simple remove in meshes/actors/character/character assets

==> femalebody_0
==> femalebody_1

For the Bodyslide files delete in CalienteTools\BodySlide\SliderPresets

==> YAZBody HDT

[u]Nexus Mod Manager[/u] - Just deactivate the mod.

[u]Mod Organizer[/u] - Just deactivate the mod.


[size=4][b]Version:[/b][/size]

1.0 Initial release
1.1 Updated waist, legs and butt
1.2 fixed 0-body for a more petit look - looks ingame much better as on SS - and overall a few adjustments in breast area.  A few forgotten slider are finally added.
1.3 Completely reworked body. Looks best with [size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body[/url][/size] now.


[size=4][b]Known Issues:[/b][/size]

[list]
[*][size=2][size=2]Might not fit your personal taste[/size][/size]
[/list][size=4][size=2]
I'm sorry to say that but I'm not able to fix that.
[/size][b]

Credits:[/b][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Caliente[/url] and Ousnius - for CBBE and Bodyslide
Bethesda - for Skyrim and the possibility to give it our own touch


[size=4][b]Permission:[/b][/size]

If you want to convert an armor for the body, no permission will be needed. Just give me credits.
If you have any questions feel free to contact me.
